subject: Running
Olympic Games (2008)
Olympic Games
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The world had not seen a sprinter like Usain Bolt, who dominated at the Beijing Olympics and became the hope of a sport despoiled by doping scandals.
snippet: The world had not seen a sprinter like Usain Bolt, who dominated at the Beijing Olympics and became the hope of a sport despoiled by doping scandals.
